location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.459 of 1855 from Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf, to Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, the original of which enclosed for the Governor in Councilâ€™s information, a copy of a letter addressed to Jones from Lord Stratford de Redcliffe, dated 27 October. The enclosure is not included in the volume.
